titleStmt.title: Peripateticall institutions. In the way of that eminent person and excellent philosopher Sr. Kenelm Digby. The theoricall part. Also a theologicall appendix of the beginning of the world. / By Thomas White Gent.
Institutionum peripateticarum. English
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.D. and are to be sold by John Williams at the sign of the Crown in S. Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: "A theologicall appendix, of the beginning of the world" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Crown in S. Paul's Church-yard.
